column4: Good night and happy new year. I'm a very new user and need help getting something back in my menu bar can anyone help me please ?
I'm using ubuntu netb ook remix and I took something off my menu bar. The shutdown button with my name and all and I cant get it back...Does anyoen know how to add that back
Add to pannel does not show the option
you're stuck.. you're going to have to leave it on forever! :) (April 1 is just around the corner)
can you right mouse click the area and "Add" ??
click your name and see if there's a drop down menu
then when you right mouse click and choose "add".. look for a different appelate .. maybe something called user switcher?
thats the one I used to show my name but thats all it shows. not the different buttons.
keep looking a different one has to be there someplace
Must be something custom for netbook remix.
I just reformatted my usb key that was setup to boot to unr otherwise I'd boot on my laptop and look as well.
thank you for your help I'll do some external search on google or ask in the forums
good luck.. it's out there that's for sure.
thats for sure. I can't be the first jack ass to remove that for no reason whatsoever
